TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit SignerInfo extends System.Object

summary.span: The class represents a signer associated with a object that represents a CMS/PKCS #7 message.

span.span: The class represents a signer associated with a object that represents a CMS/PKCS #7 message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks によって表されるシグネチャ、クラスは、経由でメッセージの内容または署名のいずれかを指定できます。The signatures represented by the class can be either over message content or a signature. 後者の署名と呼びます、*副署名*です。The latter kind of signature is referred to as a *countersignature*. CMS/PKCS #7 のこの実装には、副署名のレベルを 1 つだけがサポートしています。This implementation of CMS/PKCS #7 supports only one level of countersignature. つまり、副署名を形成する、署名を署名することができますが、その副署名を再度署名することはできません。That is, a signature can be signed, which forms a countersignature, but that countersignature cannot be signed again. このクラスには、パブリックなコンス トラクターがありません。そのため、そのパブリックにインスタンス化できません。This class does not have a public constructor; therefore, it cannot be publicly instantiated. これは、読み取り専用クラスからアクセスできる、プロパティです。It is a read-only class accessible from the property.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Certificate As X509Certificate2

summary.span: The property retrieves the signing certificate associated with the signer information.

span.span: The property retrieves the signing certificate associated with the signer information.

value.span: 署名証明書を表すオブジェクト。

span.span: An object that represents the signing certificate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 署名証明書が署名を使用して時刻に含まれていない場合、プロパティ、その証明書は返されません。If the signing certificate is not included at signing time by using the property, then the certificate will not be returned.

param.name: verifySignatureOnly
param.span: A bool value that specifies whether only the digital signature is verified.

span.span: A bool value that specifies whether only the digital signature is verified.

param.span: If verifySignatureOnly is , only the signature is verified.

span.span: If verifySignatureOnly is , only the signature is verified.

param.span: If verifySignatureOnly is , the digital signature is verified, the certificate chain is validated, and the purposes of the certificates are validated.

span.span: If verifySignatureOnly is , the digital signature is verified, the certificate chain is validated, and the purposes of the certificates are validated.

param.span: The purposes of the certificate are considered valid if the certificate has no key usage or if the key usage supports digital signature or nonrepudiation.

span.span: The purposes of the certificate are considered valid if the certificate has no key usage or if the key usage supports digital signature or nonrepudiation.

summary.span: The method verifies the digital signature of the message and, optionally, validates the certificate.

span.span: The method verifies the digital signature of the message and, optionally, validates the certificate.

remarks.format: ## Remarks このメソッドは、デジタル署名の検証に失敗した、または検証の要件が満たされなかった場合に例外をスローします。This method throws an exception if the verification of the digital signature fails or any validation requirements are not met. 複雑な検証が必要な場合、呼び出し元ように指定できます、署名のみが検証を使用して、カスタム検証を実行するオブジェクト。If more complex validation is required, the caller can specify that only the signature is verified and then use an object to perform custom validation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks このメソッドは、デジタル署名の検証に失敗した、または検証の要件が満たされなかった場合に例外をスローします。This method throws an exception if the verification of the digital signature fails or any validation requirements are not met. 複雑な検証が必要な場合、呼び出し元ように指定できます、署名のみが検証を使用して、カスタム検証を実行するオブジェクト。If more complex validation is required, the caller can specify that only the signature is verified and then use an object to perform custom validation.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ComputeCounterSignature() cil managed

summary.span: The method prompts the user to select a signing certificate, creates a countersignature, and adds the signature to the CMS/PKCS #7 message.

span.span: The method prompts the user to select a signing certificate, creates a countersignature, and adds the signature to the CMS/PKCS #7 message.

summary.span: Countersignatures are restricted to one level.

span.span: Countersignatures are restricted to one level.

remarks.format: ## Remarks CMS/PKCS #7 のこの実装には、副署名のレベルを 1 つだけがサポートしています。This implementation of CMS/PKCS #7 supports only one level of countersignature. つまり、副署名を形成する、署名を署名することができますが、その副署名を再度署名することはできません。That is, a signature can be signed, which forms a countersignature, but that countersignature cannot be signed again. このメソッドは、このメッセージの署名者を選択するユーザー インターフェイスを表示します。This method displays a user interface in which you choose signers for this message. 現在のプロセスが実行されている必要があります*ユーザー対話モード*つまりをプロパティに設定されている`true`です。This requires that the current process is running in *user interactive mode*, meaning that the property is set to `true`. サービスのプロセスまたは Web アプリケーション内の実行中である場合を除き、プロセスはユーザー対話モードで通常です。A process is normally in user interactive mode unless it is a service process or running inside a Web application. 署名証明書を持つが、次の条件を満たすが一覧に表示されます。Signers whose certificates meet the following conditions will be displayed in the list: - 証明書は、関連付けられている秘密キーを持ちます。The certificate has an associated private key. - 証明書はその有効期間です。The certificate is within its validity period. - 証明書のキー使用法ありませんまたはデジタル署名と否認不可をサポートするキー使用法がします。The certificate has no key usage or a key usage that supports digital signatures or nonrepudiation. 署名者の証明書を選択、My ストア。Signer certificates are chosen from the My store. ## .NET Framework セキュリティ.NET Framework Security ユーザー インターフェイスを表示するのには、次のアクセス許可が必要です。The following permissions are required to display the user interface: - 署名キーにアクセスするには、次のアクセス許可が必要です。The following permissions are required to access the signature key: - -

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SignedAttributes As CryptographicAttributeObjectCollection

summary.span: The property retrieves the collection of signed attributes that is associated with the signer information.

span.span: The property retrieves the collection of signed attributes that is associated with the signer information.

summary.span: Signed attributes are signed along with the rest of the message content.

span.span: Signed attributes are signed along with the rest of the message content.

value.span: A符号付きの属性を表すコレクション。

span.span: A collection that represents the signed attributes.

value.span: 符号付きの属性がない場合は、プロパティ値は空のコレクションです。

span.span: If there are no signed attributes, the property is an empty collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 含まれる可能性が符号付きの属性の使用例、のコレクションを取得して、プロパティは、時間属性を署名します。An example of a signed attribute that might be included in the collection retrieved by the property is the signing time attribute. 符号付きの属性は、の残りの部分と共に署名、メッセージの内容。Signed attributes are signed along with the rest of the message content. これは、正常に署名を確認するパーティがこれらの属性の内容が本物でと、変更されていないことの信頼度を持つことができることを意味します。This means that a party that successfully verifies the signature can have confidence that the contents of these attributes are authentic and have not been altered. Aオブジェクトおよびオブジェクトが自動的に生成され、配置で、プロパティされるたびに、対応する署名者のプロパティが空ではありません。A object and a object will be automatically generated and placed in the property whenever the property for the corresponding signer is not empty.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property UnsignedAttributes As CryptographicAttributeObjectCollection

summary.span: The property retrieves the collection of unsigned attributes that is associated with the content.

span.span: The property retrieves the collection of unsigned attributes that is associated with the content.

summary.span: Unsigned attributes can be modified without invalidating the signature.

span.span: Unsigned attributes can be modified without invalidating the signature.

value.span: A符号なしの属性を表すコレクション。

span.span: A collection that represents the unsigned attributes.

value.span: 符号なしの属性がない場合は、プロパティ値は空のコレクションです。

span.span: If there are no unsigned attributes, the property is an empty collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 残りの部分と符号なしの属性が署名されていない、メッセージの内容。Unsigned attributes are not signed along with the rest of the message content. 場合でも、パーティは、正常に署名を検証、符号なしの属性は変更されている可能性があり、完全性や整合性をあるとは見なされない必要があります。Even though a party successfully verifies the signature, the unsigned attributes may have been altered and should not be considered to have authenticity or integrity. 含まれる可能性が符号なしの属性の使用例、のコレクションを取得して、プロパティは、副署名します。An example of an unsigned attribute that might be included in the collection retrieved by the property is a countersignature.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Version As Integer
public: property int Version { int get(); };

summary.span: The property retrieves the signer information version.

span.span: The property retrieves the signer information version.

value.span: 署名者情報のバージョンを指定する整数値。

span.span: An int value that specifies the signer information version.

remarks.format: ## Remarks バージョンは、メッセージが PKCS #7 メッセージまたは Cryptographic Message Syntax (CMS) のメッセージかどうかを判断します。The version determines whether the message is a PKCS #7 message or a Cryptographic Message Syntax (CMS) message. CMS は、PKCS #7 の新しいスーパー セットです。CMS is a newer superset of PKCS #7.
